About
Soi Dog Foundation is S.E. Asiaâ€™s largest rescue organisation for vulnerable stray dogs and cats. For 20 years, supported by generous donations and global volunteers, SDF has worked tirelessly to reduce animal suffering through CNVR (Catch; Neuter; Vaccinate; Return) programmes. For animals unable to be returned safely to the streets, SDF provides sanctuary, as well as local and international adoption services. SDF is a haven where sick and vulnerable dogs and cats receive world-class medical care, and love. SDF is working in several countries to help end the inhumane and barbaric dog meat trade. Guided tours available Monday-Friday at 10:00am and 1:30pm. Following the 40-minute tour, visitors are encouraged to socialise with our lovely cats and dogs. Impromtu tours are not available between 11:30am and 1:00pm, although between these times, visitors are invited to socialise in the cattery or spend time in the visitor centre. Volunteers are welcome Monday to Friday from 9am.
Duration: 1-2 hours
Meets animal welfare guidelines

See what travelers are saying
  • Evelyne P
    Temse, Belgium1 contribution
    Heartwarming experience
    I have recently visited the sanctuary together with my husband and it was such a wonderful experience which I could recommend to everyone who is visiting the region of Phuket. Their efforts in saving cats and dogs is heartwarming, and the animals are taken good care of. Thank you to all of the volunteers and employees that are committed in creating a better life for these animals. Upon your visit, you receive a guided tour and are able to cuddle with puppies. You'll also have the opportunity to visit the cat residence, where you are able to pet, hug and play with them. It's so lovely to see that even after experiencing heavy trauma, they are happy and playful. Many greetings from Belgium.
    Chrissie M
    Dear Secretdartiste, Thank you for visiting us at Soi Dog and the wonderful review. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your tour, and had a warm welcome from the puppies and cats. All of the dog and cat residents here are too vulnerable to return to the community, and rely on the staff and volunteers to make sure their lives are as comfortable and enriching as possible, while they wait for potential adoptions to loving homes. Spending time with our kind visitors also contributes to this. Thank you for encouraging others to visit us, and spend time with the dogs and cats. We hope to welcome you back one day! Best wishes.
    Written June 29, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited June 2023
    Written June 28, 2023
  • KiwiDragonfly
    Masterton, New Zealand41 contributions
    A humbling place to visit.
    After supporting Soi Dog for several years now, it was great to finally make it to Thailand and visit the centre. Sadly, as we were travelling as part of a group, our accommodation was much too far away to allow us to volunteer so we had to make do with a three hour visit. We were taken around by a fun and passionate guide who explained the origins and roles of the organisation and everywhere we went we were greeted by a sea of happy, wagging tails. We got to hang out with a pack of crazy puppies, before meeting the two dogs that we sponsor, one of which we managed to take for a short walk. The tour finished with a visit to the cat centre, which was also interactive. All staff members and volunteers we met were friendly, helpful and clearly invested in their various roles of saving and caring for the animals. This is animal rescue on a big scale and we are proud to be able to make our small contribution.
    Chrissie M
    Dear KiwiDragonfly, Thank you for visiting Soi Dog and the excellent review! We appreciate you making the long journey to the north of the island, and spending time with the resident dogs and cats here. They really do love to welcome our visitors with cuddles and cheekiness. It is good to hear that you saw firsthand how passionate everybody is about prioritising the wellbeing of the dogs and cats. Every staff member or volunteer carries out a role that benefits the lives of the dogs and cats at the shelter, as well as other parts of Thailand and Asia. Thank you also for kindly sponsoring two of our residents. We are pleased they were able to meet you, and thank you personally. Sponsorship is the best way to help the dogs and cats who cannot be adopted for health reasons, and enables them to live a comfortable, happy life at the shelter. We really could not continue to help so many animals in need without kind hearted people like you. We hope you can visit again one day! Best wishes.
    Written July 2, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited June 2023
    Written June 29, 2023
  • Louise M
    Brisbane, Australia48 contributions
    Loved the experience
    Spent 8 days at Soi Dog shelter and loved every minute. The facilities and staff at the shelter are incredible. If you love animals and want to help out, I encourage you to volunteer your time here. You won't regret sharing your time and love with the dogs and cats as it is repaid tenfold.
    Chrissie M
    Dear Louise, Thank you for volunteering with us at Soi Dog, and leaving a review about your experience. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time here as much as the dogs and cats enjoyed their time with you. Without kind people like you spending time exercising, socialising and giving love to the dogs and cats, we could not continue to help so many in need. We look forward to welcoming you back one day! Best wishes.
    Written July 16, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited July 2023

    Will visit the lovely cute little ones everytime I visit Phuket
    Absolutely a must go place to support the place, the people and most importantly the beautiful and lovely cute little ones! Whether you are a dog or cat lover or not, go and have a visit and if you have time you can even volunteer for a day or more. Donation is up to you and no one will ever force you to donate anything.
    Chrissie M
    Dear Veteranito, Thank you for visiting us at Soi Dog and the lovely review. Our dogs and cats like to give visitors a warm welcome, and thank you for your support. We really appreciate you encouraging people to volunteer with us. We have so many dogs here who need walking and socialising, and cats who need socialising and cuddling. We look forward to welcoming you back to Soi Dog one day! Best wishes.
    Written August 6, 2023

    Amazing
    This place is incredible. The staff are lovely. You can tell all the dogs are loved and looked after. Theyâ€™re all so happy. They accomodate the dogs so well depending on their needs. They have them in size ranges, age, and needs. The sanctuary is beautiful and big. And we got to play with some of the dogs. We bought some items to help support them since they offer free tours. Next time Iâ€™m in Thailand I will volunteer here. Thankyou Ghan for the tour!
    Chrissie M
    Dear Toniyaj, Thank you for visiting us at Soi Dog and the wonderful feedback. We are so pleased to hear you saw for yourself that the wellbeing of the dogs and cats is the priority for all of us here. Gan, the dogs and the cats love to give our visitors a very warm welcome! We look forward to welcoming you back as a volunteer one day. Best wishes.

    Powerful
    Just wonderful, staggering how the charity has grown and diversified Will be a lifelong supporter, and come back to choose a dog when I can! Please keep up with volunteering, funds, adoptions. Your donations are in the best possible place! Please adopt and don't shop
    Chrissie M
    Dear Tessas979, Thank you for visiting Soi Dog and the excellent review. We are so thankful to kind people like you, enabling us to help more and more dogs and cats in need. We really appreciate you encouraging others to support Soi Dog, and to consider adopting rather than buying from breeders. There are so many beautiful souls here waiting for loving homes and families. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Best wishes.
    Written August 27, 2023

  • Rachel S
    18 contributions
    A sanctuary full of love and care - volunteers here become part of the Soi Dog family
    I spent a week volunteering with Soi Dog and it was the best ending to my trip. The staff is amazing and so thoughtful, and you can tell that you've entered a place where love and care is in abundance. I had an amazing time meeting dogs of all ages, sizes, breed and needs and taking them out on walks and (those who loved it) to the sanctuary's pool. It's beautiful watching dogs and cats who were treated so badly before being saved to thriving in this sanctuary and loving human contact. I am so thankful for all the work Soi Dog is doing for Asia's dogs and cats - they work hard despite the hardships they face in helping these animals have a better chance in life. I will continue supporting them through donations and sponsoring, and will hopefully be back to volunteering again soon! I encourage everyone who has time to spare while visiting/living in Phuket to visit Soi Dog and meet the lovely souls who live here. Sidenote - It's hard not to have any favourites while volunteering here but Butterboy stole my heart. I hope he finds his forever home soon x
    Chrissie M
    Dear Rachel, Thank you for volunteering with us, and such wonderful feedback. We are so thankful for the energy and love you gave to Soi Dog, benefiting the dogs and cats here so much! It is hard not to fall in love with our blind one year old Butterboy. He is full of love and energy, and enjoys his daily walks and cuddles with kind volunteers like you. As much as we all love him here, we also hope he finds the comfortable loving home he deserves very soon. We are so grateful for the many ways you support Soi Dog, enabling us to continue to help so many dogs and cats in need. Thank you also for encouraging others to visit and volunteer. We are always in need of volunteers to enrich the lives of the dogs and cats living here. We hope to welcome you back to Soi Dog again very soon! Best wishes.
    Written September 5, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited August 2023
    Traveled solo
    Written September 5, 2023
  • Kevin H
    Galway, Ireland13 contributions
    A must visit for Dog lovers
    I first visited Soi Dog in 2017 for 1 week and since then every year I have been back, now with my partner. I normally volunteer for a week or two sometimes full day or half days. Itâ€™s just a fantastic Charity & Shelter. The staff & fellow volunteers are so friendly and the dogs are just amazing. Would recommend you visit and strong recommend you volunteer for a few days as youâ€™ll never regret it and like me will probably keep coming back.
    Chrissie M
    Dear Kevin, Thank you for all the time and energy you have given to Soi Dog over the years. We really could not continue to help so many dogs and cats in need without kind people like you! As we have so many dogs and cats living at Soi Dog now, we need more volunteers than ever, to help walk, socialise and play with the dogs, and cuddle and play with the cats. This helps them learn to trust humans, increases their chance of adoption, and also enriches their lives while living at the shelter. We appreciate you leaving a review encouraging others to volunteer with us, and become part of the global Soi Dog community. Thank you so much from all of us, dogs, cats and humans at Soi Dog. Best wishes.
    Written September 17, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited September 2023
    Traveled as a couple
    Written September 15, 2023
  • Kami
    34 contributions
    Must do if in Thailand & for an amazing cause
    We spent 2 days volunteering here whilst in Phuket - with having a rescue dog myself and being big animal people it was on the top of our â€˜to doâ€™sâ€™ whilst here. Everyone was so friendly and welcoming, you could really tell they were excited to have volunteers helping out! The whole experience was just so good, obviously upsetting at some parts seeing what a lot of the dogs & cats have been through before Soi Dog taking them in, but when you see all the work, care and love that goes into each animal and how far so many of them have come it just shows how much of an amazing job theyâ€™re all doing. If youâ€™re visiting Phuket please add this to your time here, itâ€™s helping out an amazing organisation but also helping out the animals they have, so many get so excited when you take them out their walk & just want to play and be loved and this also helps many of them with their journey to getting a forever home! Thank you to everyone at Soi Dog for having us we will definitely be back! Special shout out to Chrissie & her team for the work they do in the volunteering space - everything was so coordinated & you all made us feel at home!
    Chrissie M
    Dear kamio396, Thank you for volunteering with us, and for taking the time to leave the wonderful review! As you saw for yourself, the dogs and cats here benefit so much from time with kind people like you. They are always so happy to see friendly faces, and it really is the highlight of their day. Thank you for encouraging others to visit and volunteer, with so many dogs and cats currently in the care of Soi Dog Foundation, we are in need of even more volunteers. And all of our volunteers enjoy the walking, playing and socialising just as much as the dogs and cats. We really could not continue to help so many animals in need without kind people like you, and hope to welcome you back one day. Best wishes.
    Written October 3, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited September 2023
    Traveled as a couple
    Written September 30, 2023
  • Pauline S
    2 contributions
    Highly Recommended for all Animal Lovers
    What an amazing job Soi Dog do! We spent a very enjoyable (albeit emotional) few hours at Soi Dog - 1600 dogs and 1400 cats in care the day we visited, and I wish I could have adopted some of them but due to Australia's quarantine laws that just wasn't possible. It seems like one dog in every 4 was missing a limb but they are in a safe place now just waiting for their forever homes. Next time we go I will do a few days volunteering. Absolutely no hard sell for donations but it was too hard to leave without shrinking the bank balance a bit!
    Chrissie M
    Dear paulinesA9430AE, Thank you for visiting Soi Dog and taking the time to leave a review. Many people find it emotional hearing about what so many of the rescue dogs and cats have experienced before coming to Soi Dog, but like you saw for yourself, they are all very well cared for here. With 1,400 dogs and 400 cats currently living at the shelter, they are always grateful for kind people like you visiting and spending time with them. We look forward to welcoming you back, hopefully as volunteers one day! Best wishes.
    Written October 9, 2023
    This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
    Visited September 2023
    Traveled as a couple
    Written October 4, 2023

We had a wonderful time hearing about the Soi Dog Foundation from our guide, Silvia! We were just in Phuket for a day and werenâ€™t sure what to do near the airport, but Iâ€™m so glad that we stumbled upon soi dog. It was encouraging after seeing so many stray animals on our trip to hear about the efforts this organization takes not only to treat and rehabilitate injured and ill animals, but also the education they offer the community about animal care! Not to mention it was so fun to help socialize the puppies! We will definitely stay connected to Soi Dog Foundation from now on.

Bath, UK47 contributions
Wonderful charity- must visit!
Apr 2024 â€¢ Couples
We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Soi Dog Foundation. We were taken on a very interesting 45 minute tour, and learnt all about the wonderful work this charity does for Street cats and dogs in Phuket. We were able to spend as much time as we wanted to with the puppies and cats. As my wife and I are disabled we werenâ€™t able to take any of the dogs out for walks, but we were pleased to be able to make a donation. This place is a must visit when you are in Phuket, they are doing an incredible job of saving dogs and cats from cruelty and mistreatment.
Written May 13, 2024

Chrissie M
Dear VictorGibbons, Thank you for visiting Soi Dog Foundation, and taking the time to leave a review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with the puppies and cats as much as they will have enjoyed the time with you. As our volunteering programme starts at 9am, and is for a minimum of two days, it is not always possible for those visiting and taking part in the tour to get involved at short notice. If you were ever interested in returning to volunteer, we could tailor a schedule that would work for you and your wife, and benefit the dogs and cats as much as possible. Thank you for very kindly donating, and for encouraging others to visit Soi Dog Foundation. We could not continue to help so many dogs and cats in need without the support of compassionate people like you. Best wishes.
Written May 18, 2024

Kind regards, Chrissie

Laura Martin
Ramsgate, UK57 contributions
Worth the drive from Phuket! Must do experience! Will make you cry and inspire you to help the animals!
May 2024 â€¢ Couples
Must go worth the trip!!!
Best experience in Thailand!
Best charity and good cause! Will make you cry !

I went with my husband on our honeymoon for a tour to meet the animals and make a donation on the wall of remembrance to commemorate our honeymoon. The best rescue center I have seen and I have worked in rescue over 20 years. Be careful though you might fall in love with a furry friend that you just have to bring home with you because that is what happened to me. Please visit and if you cannot visit please donate! This is a wonderful cause with dedicated people who really care about the animals!
Written May 10, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Chrissie M
Dear Laura R, Thank you for visiting us while on your honeymoon, and the wonderful review. We hope you also cried happy tears, as so many of the dogs and cats here at the shelter have shown so much resilience, and can finally live a happy and comfortable life, after receiving the treatment and care they needed. It is very exciting to hear that you plan to adopt one of our residents. All of our dogs and cats here are patiently waiting for the day someone falls in love with them and takes them home. This not only gives them the loving home they so deserve, but makes space at the shelter for more animals in need. Making a donation for a plaque on our wall of remembrance is such a beautiful way to commemorate your honeymoon, and we really hope you can return in the future to see this. Thank you for encouraging others to visit, and learn about the many ways Soi Dog are reducing the suffering of dogs and cats in Thailand, as well as other parts of Asia. We look forward to welcoming you back again one day. Best wishes.
Written May 14, 2024
This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
Monika T
Bandung, Indonesia50 contributions
Amazing 2nd Time Around
Apr 2024 â€¢ Friends
A very rewarding experience indeed. 1st time I came here was last year and had an amazing experience. Spent 4 days volunteering. And this year, I'm coming back as I promised to the beautiful volunteering team. This year, I spent 8 days volunteering, and still felt it wasn't enough ðŸ˜”

The place is clean all around, expanded the area and added more runs & off-lead areas.

All, and I mean, ALL the staffs here are so nice, friendly, all smiles. The dogs and runs are very well taken care of.

Be prepared for the heat if you come in April, but if you don't mind the heat, April after Songkran is the best time because it's low season, so stuffs are cheaper ðŸ˜

I'll be coming back next year, THANK YOU SOI DOG FOUNDATION for all of your hardwork for soi dogs & cats of Thailand.

Khob khun kha, God bless you all

A great place to visit if you are an animal lover
Apr 2024 â€¢ Couples
A great place to visit if you are in phuket, we had a brief but interesting tour around the foundation , the tour is totally free. We met some of the thousands of dogs/cats in there care , got to see some of the rescued pups in there puppy run, would have gladly took them all home with us! Some of the figures of what this place have achieved so far are amazing, offering a brighter future for the street and meat dogs of asia. We would have liked to spend longer with them so are thinking of returning to spend some time volunteering with them. The foundation is very close to the airport and we twinned the tour with a trip to mai khao beach which is close by. Highly recommended

Chrissie M
Dear Latty666, Thank you for visiting us at Soi Dog Foundation, and taking the time to leave a review. We are so pleased to hear you were warmly welcomed by some of the dogs and cats living at the shelter, and do hope you can return to volunteer with us one day! With almost 2,000 dogs and cats living here, we are always in need of help walking and socialising with the dogs, as well as cuddling and playing with the cats. This not only enriches their lives while they are living here, but teaches them to trust and receive love from humans, which increases their chances of being adopted. Thank you for encouraging others to visit, and learn about the many ways Soi Dog Foundation are reducing the suffering of dogs and cats in Thailand, as well as other parts of Asia. We look forward to welcoming you back again one day. Best wishes.

Incredible place! Must visit!
Apr 2024 â€¢ Friends
OMG! This place is incredible!!! I'm a monthly donor and I've been following them on social media so I was pretty familiar with this organization. I've always dreamed of visiting it one day. And this April I got a chance to do it! All the dogs and cats are so well looked after. The place is clean and nice. They have a pool for dogs and a park next to a pond.
The staff and volunteers are so passionate about the animals, you can feel the love they have for these babies. They let us spend some time with the puppies and the cats. I also got to meet the dog I sponsor. This is by far the highlight of my whole vacation in Thailand! I am definitely will be back and will sign up to volunteer!

Please visit them. They do not push for donations or adoptions. They just want to educate and bring awareness. Donations/adoptions are completely up to each individual!

Dear Robin, $29 is the amount to sponsor a dog here at Soi Dog Foundation. For this, you receive regular updates throughout the year from your sponsor dog, including photos and updates. The information on the sponsor page on our website also states that your monthly subscription fee also goes not only towards your sponsor dog but also towards helping other animals under the care of Soi Dog. Written November 10, 2020
Sam M
Phuket, Thailand
7 contributions
Dear Victoria, Firstly, thank you so much for considering Soi Dog in your legacy plans. This is a truly wonderful gesture. And, to answer your question about flight volunteers and adopted animals - The travel costs of animals from Soi Dog and travelling overseas are covered by the adopter. This includes the excess baggage fee that the animals travel under, the travel crate, and any administrative fees ( dictated by the airline and import/export authorities). The costs associated with the flight volunteer (airline tickets etc) are covered by the flight volunteer themselves. We hope this helps! Many thanks.
